AT.name: Breath of Fire™
AT.description: Vor langer Zeit wurde die Welt beinahe durch den Krieg zwischen den Drachenclans zerstört. Heute, Jahrhunderte nachdem die Licht- und Dunkeldrachen ihre Auseinandersetzung beendet haben, erwacht das Böse erneut! Schließ dich Ryu, einem Nachfahren der Lichtdrachen mit der Fähigkeit, sich in eine mächtige Bestie zu verwandeln, an. Begleite ihn, während er versucht, seine Schwester zu retten, und vereitele den Plan der Dunkeldrachen. Sieben Gefährten werden sich ihm auf seiner Reise anschließen, jeder mit einzigartigen Tierfähigkeiten. Breath of Fire wurde von Capcom entwickelt und enthält außerdem ein paar geschickt versteckte Charakter-Cameos, wenn man weiß, wo man suchen muss! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Breath of Fire™
AU.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. Developed by Capcom, Breath of Fire also features cleverly-hidden character cameos – if you know where to look! This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Breath of Fire™
BG.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. Developed by Capcom, Breath of Fire also features cleverly-hidden character cameos – if you know where to look! This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Breath of Fire™
BE.description: Il y a bien longtemps, la guerre au sein du Clan du Dragon avait presque anéanti la planète. Après des siècles de lutte entre les Dragons de Lumière et les Dragons Noirs, le mal refait désormais surface ! Rejoignez Ryu, un descendant des Dragons de Lumière qui a la capacité de se transformer en une puissante bête, sauvez sa sœur et déjouez les plans des Dragons Noirs. Sept de ses camarades ayant le pouvoir de se changer en animal l'accompagnent dans sa quête. Développé par Capcom, Breath of Fire vous permet d'apercevoir d'autres personnages bien cachés... encore faut-il savoir où chercher ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

This is the US version of the game.

ES.name: Breath of Fire™
ES.description: Hace mucho tiempo, la guerra entre los clanes de dragones estuvo a punto de destruir el planeta. Ahora, siglos después de que los Dragones de la Luz y los Dragones Oscuros ajustaran sus cuentas, la sombra del mal resurge con fuerza. Únete a Ryu, un descendiente de los Dragones de la Luz con la capacidad de transformarse en una bestia poderosa, y ayúdale a rescatar a su hermana y a acabar con los planes de los Dragones Oscuros. Para ello, contaréis con el apoyo de siete acompañantes con poderes animales únicos. En Breath of Fire, desarrollado por Capcom, también hay varios personajes ocultos: ¡si buscas en los lugares adecuados, darás con ellos! Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Breath of Fire™
IT.description: In un'epoca lontana, quando la guerra tra clan di draghi aveva condotto il mondo sull'orlo della rovina, le due fazioni rivali del Drago della Luce e del Drago dell'Ombra sembravano avere finalmente trovato la pace. Ma ora, a distanza di secoli, il male è tornato! Segui Ryu, l'eroico discendente dei Draghi della Luce capace di trasformarsi in una creatura portentosa, nella sua coraggiosa missione! Insieme a sette fedeli compagni, ciascuno dotato di bestiali abilità, dovrà salvare la sorella e sventare i piani degli antichi nemici. Sviluppato da Capcom, in Breath of Fire si nascondono anche alcuni personaggi speciali... se riuscirai a scovarli! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Breath of Fire™
NL.description: In een ver verleden dreigde de wereld te vernietigen door de oorlog tussen drakenstammen. Nu, na eeuwen van rust, is het kwaad herrezen! Ryu, een nakomeling van de Light Dragons, kan veranderen in een machtig beest. Volg hem op zijn avontuur om zijn zus te redden en de plannen van de Dark Dragons te dwarsbomen. Hij wordt vergezeld door een groep van 7 kompanen, elk met zijn eigen dierenkracht. Breath of Fire is ontwikkeld door Capcom en herbergt een aantal cameo’s van bekende personages als je weet waar je moet zoeken. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Breath of Fire™
NZ.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. Developed by Capcom, Breath of Fire also features cleverly-hidden character cameos – if you know where to look! This is the US version of the game.

PL.name: Breath of Fire™
PL.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. Developed by Capcom, Breath of Fire also features cleverly-hidden character cameos – if you know where to look! This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Breath of Fire™
PT.description: Numa época longínqua, a guerra entre os clãs de dragões esteve muito perto de causar a destruição do mundo. Agora, séculos depois dos Light Dragons e dos Dark Dragons terem aparentemente encontrado a paz, regressa novamente a sombra do mal! Junta-te a Ryu, um descendente dos Light Dragons, que possui a habilidade de se transformar num animal poderoso, e ajuda-o a resgatar a sua irmã e a destruir os planos dos Dark Dragons. Ele conta ainda com o apoio de um grupo de sete companheiros, cada um com poderes animais únicos. Breath of Fire foi produzido pela Capcom e apresenta também personagens estrategicamente escondidos. Se procurares nos locais certos, conseguirás encontrá-los! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Breath of Fire™
RU.description: В незапамятные времена война между драконами Света и Тьмы почти уничтожила мир. Но в один прекрасный день эта вражда прекратилась, с тех пор прошли столетия, и зло вновь поднимает голову! Отправляйтесь навстречу приключениям вместе с Ryu, потомком драконов Света, способным перевоплощаться в мощного зверя. Ваша цель — спасти сестру главного героя и остановить темных драконов. Ryu объединяет свои усилия с семью спутниками, каждый из которых обладает уникальными способностями зверей. Разработчик Breath of Fire, компания Capcom, приготовила для вас сюрприз: смотрите в оба, чтобы не пропустить появление нескольких загадочных персонажей! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.
